mapper.select: select D.wstdt , A.indate, (case when A.rwflag = 'D' THEN '주간' WHEN A.rwflag = 'N' THEN '야간' ELSE '' END) AS rwflagnm, A.ecltnm, (CASE WHEN D.wflag='00010' then (DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, E.wrps, '', '')) WHEN D.wflag='00020' then (DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, d.wrps, '', '')) ELSE '' END) as pernm , isnull((select wrmcnm from TB_FPLAN_WRMC where wflag = A.wflag and wrmc = D.wrmc),'') as wrmcnm , ISNULL(DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_WFLAG', D.custcd, D.wflag, '', ''),'') as wflagnm, C.jpum, C.jchajong, A.lotno, (CASE WHEN D.wflag = '00010' THEN A.prod_qty WHEN D.wflag='00020' THEN E.wotqt - E.wbdqt ELSE 0 END) as prod_qty , d.wotqt, D.wbdqt, d.wotqt - D.wbdqt AS WJQTY, D.wfrdt, D.wtrdt, DATEDIFF(mi, D.wfrdt,D.wtrdt) / 60 AS GAPTIME FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_W010 E ON E.plan_no = A.plan_no LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_W020 F ON F.plan_no = A.plan_no , TB_FPLAN_work D WITH (NOLOCK) , jcode C WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.pcode = C.jkey and A.plan_no = D.plan_no and A.indate between '20230701' and '20230930' and D.wflag LIKE '%' AND A.lotno Like '%' and D.wrps like '%' ORDER BY A.LOTNO , f.WFLAG, D.WFRDT
